readable.title: 1231229740_8dcbf80bfb
readable.content: A child in gray clothes is sleeping on a red cushion . A little boy has fallen asleep on a miniature sofa and a pacifier in his mouth . A sleeping child sucking on a pacifier . A toddler wearing a pacifier is sleeping on a red blanket with a teddy bear at his side . a young baby sucking a Binky asleep in a chair .
